events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30th, 2024, involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
After initial review, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in the collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to manage all communications and follow up on necessary claim procedures.
The insurer formally acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the insured that the case will be handled with priority.
The insurer requested the insured to submit the police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and witness statements for investigation.
The insured submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the car’s damage and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and statements to determine the circumstances and liability of the accident.
The investigation concluded, confirming the insured was not at fault and damage to the vehicle was consistent with the reported collision.
The insurer provided a settlement offer covering repair costs and related expenses as per the insured’s policy coverage.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the timely assistance and clarity provided throughout the claim process.
The claim was formally approved based on the investigation findings and acceptance of the settlement offer by the insured.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the insured’s account to cover all approved repair costs.
The claim was officially closed following receipt of payment confirmation and acknowledgement from the insured.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
